requirements.summary: Update the sticky header emblem to use the newly uploaded emblem image while keeping advisor text and call CTA unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Header emblem graphic in the sticky top bar is updated to the new uploaded emblem artwork (not the previous /assets/generated/tata-aig-logo.dim_512x512.png).
Advisor text remains visible and unchanged: "Arya Vineeth" and "TATA AIG Advisor".
The call CTA remains unchanged and continues to use tel:9495670101.
The emblem displays cleanly (no distortion), preserves aspect ratio, and fits within the existing header height on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Replace the current emblem src ("/assets/generated/tata-aig-logo.dim_512x512.png") with the new static asset path "/assets/header-emblem-reset.dim_512x512.png"; keep advisor text and tel:9495670101 unchanged; adjust image classes to ensure aspect ratio is preserved (e.g., keep w-auto and add object-contain) so it fits cleanly within the existing header height across breakpoints.

requirements.summary: Add a web-optimized emblem static asset under frontend/public/assets and reference it from the header with accurate English alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: An optimized emblem asset is available under frontend/public/assets/ (e.g., PNG) derived from download-1.jpg.
HeaderTopBar references the new static asset path under /assets/ rather than pointing to the old generated logo path.
Image alt text is English and accurately describes the emblem.

file_operations.description: Create an optimized PNG emblem asset derived from the uploaded download-1.jpg at frontend/public/assets/header-emblem-reset.dim_512x512.png (sized/cropped for clean header display and web delivery).

Update the alt text to an accurate English description of the emblem (e.g., "TATA AIG emblem") and ensure the referenced src points to /assets/header-emblem-reset.dim_512x512.png (not the old generated logo).
